column5: Well I took the advise of some anglers on here and scouted a new location to take the kiddies. Went out to m pleasant ponds and did pretty good. We went on Sunday but a little too late. We spoke with some people there and they informed us to "come early" So we did. We hit fish the first cast. We nailed perch bass sunfish, I caught a jumbo perch and a decent 2 lb bass. We were losing bait like crazy but the kids had fun!!!!! Again thanks for the hook up guys
That is a great place for the kids,esp having them watch the fish swim around!
Good to hear OFC could be of service. Glad to hear the kids caught fish and a good time was had by all.
